events.message: I was involved in a car accident yesterday where my vehicle collided with another at a stop sign, causing moderate damage.
The claim has been categorised under auto accident as it pertains to damage sustained by a personal vehicle during a collision.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your case to assist you throughout the claims process and gather the necessary information.
Your claim has been officially acknowledged, and we have started the initial processing to ensure a smooth and timely resolution.
Please provide a copy of the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and your driverâ€™s license to continue with the investigation.
All required documents including the police report and photographs of the accident have been submitted for your claim review.
We have begun the investigation into the circumstances of the auto accident to determine liability and extent of damages.
The investigation is now complete, confirming the other party was at fault and assessing repair costs for your vehicle.
A settlement has been proposed to cover all repair expenses, replacement car rental, and related costs concerning the accident.
The client responded positively to the proposed settlement terms and expressed satisfaction with the communication so far.
Following the acceptance of the settlement, the claim has been officially approved to proceed with payment and repairs.
The payment for vehicle repairs and other coverages has been issued directly to the authorized repair shop.
The claim has been successfully closed after all payments were processed and the vehicle repair was completed.
All documents and records related to your auto accident claim have been archived for future reference if needed.
